activities: We provide EU-based retailers with a virtual storefront for the sale of digital media. In the course of a customer making a purchase on our storefront website and/or app, the customer will provide us with such personal information.
personaldata: Including, but not limited to, customer's name, phone number, e-mail, credit card number, driver license's number, social security car (where applicable), age, personal interests and preferences. To the extent any data is manually processed, it's covered under this policy.
